column3:
“I can taste watermelon, I love it!
Form: Shatter
Brand: Greenpharms Dispensary brand
THC: ~70%

I like to try strains that are on the rare side. I am very happy I chose Mother's Tongue, it was that or get the strain Future (which I've had only in flower form).
Very nice productive high, accompanied by a noticeable head buzz. I have a high tolerance, but one dab has me feeling good for a couple hours. 
There's also an...”
“I am not a heavy sativa fan, but this was a pleasure to smoke.  The variety I had from my caregiver was more the earthy" flavor
column4: that I personally love.  The actual high was not very long(maybe 2-3hours)
column5: but made my mind very active and had a mildly relaxing state on my body allowing me to do a short journal entry and play some Fallout:New Vegas in a good
column6: comfortable mood.  Despite my preference to indicas or indi...”"

column3:
“So glad I chose to get this.
Form: Shatter
Brand: Greenpharms dispensary brand
THC%: ~70%

I took a 15 mule bus trip out to Greenpharms in Mesa because they had Mother's Tongue & Future in shatter form.  I had a hard time deciding. between the 2, but I think I chose correctly. Plus I've had Future in flower, but haven't had this in any form.

I totally can taste watermelon I love it. Also spicy earth notes on the exh...”
“Not much of a sativa fan. But these buds are dense as hell and pretty. Has a great flavor and a nice buzz”

“First time my caregiver did this last last year it was decent the first time around. We decided to give it another go and ever since then every crop has been better and better to where this is now a permanent in his garden and one of our top strains.”
“if you are the sativa type when it comes to smoking cannabis then this new strain is for you!! :)”
“I like this strain a lot. Really great for daytime use. Helps me get stuff done.”
“if you are the sativa type when it comes to smoking cannabis then this new strain is for you!! :)”
“I guess you'll get a review from me every 70 days...As this gem isn't going anywhere. Every time I think it can't get any better”
“Good for if you need a burst of energy, but not great if you already have anxiety. This is intense be careful with how much you smoke it doesn't take a lot.”
“It got me high. It also made me super hungry.”
“Has a nice texture, was part shatter. dark colored and dense.”

“Hits you fast, hits you hard. It wakes you up. Borderline euphoric. A good substitute to coffee or energy drinks if you like the jolt of such indulgences. The buds are dense and have a great flavor. Can’t see why it doesn’t have more ratings.”

“We loved this strain and had a really good sesh in the woods the buds smelled like Hawaiian punch and were nice and dense. They were covered in tricomes on the outside and had even more when the bud broke open and we got a lot of or if when it was ground.”
“This is the best weed I have ever smoked. Actually makes me feel smarter, not dumber.”

“Wow odd name to me. The bud has a minty finish for me. Harsh and earthy. The buzz is very headzie, with minor hallucinations, i have not used bud like this in ages,  Heavy burn out on the end,Has indo effects on me. I wouldn't recommend fkr a wake and bake sheesh, use this as a unwind at the end of a busy day.”
